text: Yakhana tadera kache tadera samane o pichana theke rasulagana ese balechilena ye, 'tomara allaha chara karo ibadata karo na.' Tara balechila, 'yadi amadera raba icche karatena tabe tini abasya'i pheresata nayila karatena. Ata'eba, tomara ya saha prerita hayecha, niscaya amara tara sathe kuphari karalama
